Package ePortfolio

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ePortfolio.Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class Window
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    JFrame that hosts all JContainers and UI elements of the displayed window.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                                                        int fieldCols,
                                                        boolean editable,
                                                        int strutWidth)
        Creates a JPanel with a JLabel and JTextField.
        Parameters:
        labelText - Text for the JLabel.
        fieldCols - Number of characters on one line of the JTextField.
        editable - Is the JTextField editable.
        strutWidth - Distance between the JLabel and JTextField.
        Returns:
        A JPanel with a JLabel and JTextField.

      • ButtonPanel

                                              int ySpacing)
        Create a JPanel for buttons.
        Parameters:
        listeners - Array of ButtonActionListeners that determine the number of JButtons to create and the names of each JButton.
        ySpacing - Spacing between each JButton.
        Returns:
        A JPanel for buttons.

      • MessageBox

        private static javax.swing.JScrollPane MessageBox​(int maxSizeYOffset)
        Creates the JScrollPane for the message box.
        Parameters:
        maxSizeYOffset - Basically the size of the upper section panel. This is used to avoid the scroll pane from having a maximum size that goes beyond the window size.
        Returns:
        The JScrollPane for the message box.

        top - Top border.
        left - Left border.
        bottom - Bottom border.
